chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: Merise Haindehl, p. 28—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah from Tarabon. She has dark hair and very blue eyes, and is tall. She has three Warders, including Jahar Narishma, one of the Asha'man. She is involved with Cadsuane's plans, and takes part in the interrogations of Semirhage. See also Narishma, Jahar.
